author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: A nice variant of a common archetype in the super Mario theme
review:
Opening;

The bone goomba is a nice variant of a character whose default form has appeared in sets and the first two blind bag series in which this character comes from .

The character -

The bone goomba is built on the super Mario leg piece in teele , with two 1×3 teele jumpers ontop with one of them having subtle side printing for the teeth , the main head is built out of two snot pieces with a printed 1×2 tile for the face , a 2×2 slope in white on each side a 2×2 unprinted white tile at the back and the factory applied sticker ontop where Mario scans him or her .

The stand -

The stand is the 4×4 Mario stand in red with a 2×2 round plate in  dark grey with two 1×2 dark grey masonry bricks and a jumper ontop for the perch in which the goomba sits , the stand also has a 1×1 round light grey tile and two flame builds using the candle piece ontop introduced with Harry potter in 2018 .

In conclusion - 

this is a pretty good character , the common nature of goombas in the super Mario theme is a well know fact so it is great to get some sort of variation other than a parachute and a pair of wings , and a non nintendo/ Mario or just gaming in general enthusiast like myself and I like this variation there must be something there for other non gamer Lego fans so I recommend it .
